name: Lee Sin
title: the Blind Monk
lore: A master of Ionia's ancient martial arts, Lee Sin is a principled fighter who channels the essence of the dragon spirit to face any challenge. Though he lost his sight many years ago, the warrior-monk has devoted his life to protecting his homeland against any who would dare upset its sacred balance. Enemies who underestimate his meditative demeanor will endure his fabled burning fists and blazing roundhouse kicks.
blurb: A master of Ionia's ancient martial arts, Lee Sin is a principled fighter who channels the essence of the dragon spirit to face any challenge. Though he lost his sight many years ago, the warrior-monk has devoted his life to protecting his homeland...
allytips: Use Sonic Wave before Dragon's Rage so you can chase the target with Resonating Strike.
Take advantage of Flurry by weaving in basic attacks between spell casts - this maximizes damage output and minimizes Energy loss.
Self-casting Safeguard and using Iron Will are powerful tools for killing neutral monsters (in the jungle).
enemytips: Stay spread out to minimize the impact of Lee Sin's ultimate, Dragon's Rage.
Lee Sin has powerful tools to combat physical damage in Iron Will and Cripple but he is still vulnerable to magic damage.
Lee Sin relies heavily on following up with his abilities. Use disables to prevent him from chaining together his abilities and attacks.

riot_spell_q.name: Sonic Wave / Resonating Strike
riot_spell_q.description:
Sonic Wave: Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing physical damage to the first enemy it encounters. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next 3 seconds.
Resonating Strike: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing physical damage based on the target's missing Health.
riot_spell_q.tooltip:
Sonic Wave: Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the first enemy it encounters, granting True Sight of the target. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next {{ e7 }} seconds.

Resonating Strike: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage based on the target's missing Health.

riot_spell_w.name: Safeguard / Iron Will
riot_spell_w.description:
Safeguard: Lee Sin rushes to target ally, shielding himself from damage. If the ally is a champion, they are also shielded. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will for the next 3 seconds.
Iron Will: Lee Sin's intense training allows him to thrive in battle. For 4 seconds, Lee Sin gains Life Steal and Spell Vamp.
riot_spell_w.tooltip:
Safeguard: Lee Sin rushes to target ally. If the ally is a champion, Lee Sin shields the ally and himself for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e3 }} seconds and Safeguard's cooldown is reduced by {{ e6 }}%. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will for the next {{ e9 }} seconds.

Iron Will: Lee Sin gains {{ e2 }}% Life Steal and Spell Vamp for {{ e8 }} seconds.

riot_spell_e.name: Tempest / Cripple
riot_spell_e.description:
Tempest: Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage and reveals enemy units hit. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast cripple for the next 3 seconds.
Cripple: Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies damaged by Tempest, reducing their Movement Speed for 4 seconds. Movement Speed recovers gradually over the duration.
riot_spell_e.tooltip:
Tempest: Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast Cripple for the next {{ e6 }} seconds.

Cripple: Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies struck by Tempest for {{ e5 }} seconds, slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}%. Movement Speed recovers gradually over the duration.

riot_spell_r.name: Dragon's Rage
riot_spell_r.description: Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick launching his target back, dealing physical damage to the target and any enemies they collide with. Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air for a short duration. This technique was taught to him by Jesse Perring, although Lee Sin does not kick players off the map.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick knocking an enemy champion back and dealing {{ damage }} physical damage.

Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air briefly and take physical damage equal to {{ damage }} plus {{ percenthpcarrythrough }}% of the initial target's bonus health.

riot_spell_i.name: Flurry
riot_spell_i.description: After Lee Sin uses an ability, his next 2 basic attacks gain Attack Speed and return Energy.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Flurry
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: After Lee Sin uses an ability, his next 2 basic attacks gain 40% Attack Speed and return 20/10 Energy.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} After using an ability, '''Lee Sin's''' next 2 [[basic attack]]s within 3 seconds gain {{sti|attack speed|{{as|40% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}}, returning {{tip|energy|{{as|{{pp|3|20 to 40|1 to 13}} energy}}}} on the first attack and {{ft|half of that|{{sti|energy|{{as|{{pp|3|10 to 20|1 to 13}} energy}}}}}} on the second.
wikia_skill_i1.notes:
* ''Flurry'' does not activate when using summoner spells or activating items.
* ''Flurry'' will still restore energy even if the attacks are {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}}, {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parried}}, {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}}, or if ''Lee Sin'' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.

wikia_skill_q1.name: Sonic Wave
wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing physical damage to the first enemy it encounters. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next 3 seconds.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lee Sin''' fires a sonic blast in the target direction, dealing {{tip|physical damage}} to the first enemy it hits and granting {{tip|true sight}} of them for 3 seconds.
wikia_skill_q1.description2: If ''Sonic Wave'' hits, '''Lee Sin''' can cast {{ai|Resonating Strike|Lee Sin}} within the next 3 seconds.
wikia_skill_q1.notes: * ''Sonic Wave's'' {{tip|true sight}} is consumed when ''Lee Sin'' casts ''Resonating Strike''.

wikia_skill_q2.name: Resonating Strike
wikia_skill_q2.blurb: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing physical damage.
wikia_skill_q2.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lee Sin''' {{tip|dashes}} to the enemy marked by {{ai|Sonic Wave|Lee Sin}}, placing himself on top of the target and dealing {{as|physical damage}}, increased by {{as|{{pp|11|key=%|type=target's '''missing''' health|0 to 100|0 to 100|key1=%|displayformula=1% per 1% of target's '''missing''' health}}|health}}.
wikia_skill_q2.leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|50 to 150}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|50*2 to 150*2}} {{as|(+ 200% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
wikia_skill_q2.notes: * ''Lee Sin'' will travel to ''Resonating Strike's'' target last location if they die while he is mid-dash.

wikia_skill_w1.name: Safeguard
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Lee Sin rushes to target ally, shielding himself from damage. If the ally is a champion, they are also shielded. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will for the next 3 seconds.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lee Sin''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target ally or friendly {{ccib|Support icon.png|ward}}. If the ally is a champion, both they and '''Lee Sin''' are {{tip|shield|shielded}} for 2 seconds and ''Safeguard's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced by 50%. '''Lee Sin''' can self-cast ''Safeguard'' to shield himself.
wikia_skill_w1.description2: If ''Safeguard'' is used, '''Lee Sin''' can cast {{ai|Iron Will|Lee Sin}} within 3 seconds.
wikia_skill_w1.notes:
* ''Lee Sin'' cannot self-cast ''Safeguard'' if he is immobilized.
* ''Safeguard'' can be used on any targetable allied unit (champions, minions, wards, {{ai|Demacian Standard|Jarvan IV}}, {{ai|Noxious Trap|Teemo}}, {{ai|Dark Passage|Thresh|Lantern}}) except towers and inhibitors.
* Casting ''Safeguard'' will interrupt {{ais|Resonating Strike|Lee Sin}} dash, preventing any potential damage.

wikia_skill_w2.name: Iron Will
wikia_skill_w2.blurb: Lee Sin's intense training allows him to thrive in battle. For 4 seconds, Lee Sin gains Life Steal and Spell Vamp.
wikia_skill_w2.description: {{sbc|Active:}} For 4 seconds, '''Lee Sin''' gains {{sti|'''bonus''' life steal}} and {{sti|'''bonus''' spell vamp}}.

wikia_skill_e2.name: Cripple
wikia_skill_e2.blurb: Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies damaged by Tempest, reducing their Movement Speed for 4 seconds. Movement Speed recovers gradually over the duration.
wikia_skill_e2.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lee Sin''' {{tip|slow|slows}} all enemies in range and marked by {{ai|Tempest|Lee Sin}} for 4 seconds, decaying over the duration.
wikia_skill_e2.notes: * ''Tempest's'' {{tip|sight}} is not removed when ''Lee Sin'' casts ''Cripple'' (unlike {{ais|Sonic Wave|Lee Sin}}).

wikia_skill_e1.name: Tempest
wikia_skill_e1.blurb: Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage and reveals enemy units hit. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast cripple for the next 3 seconds.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lee Sin''' smashes the ground, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies and granting {{tip|sight}} of them for 4 seconds.
wikia_skill_e1.description2: If ''Tempest'' hits an enemy, '''Lee Sin''' can cast {{ai|Cripple|Lee Sin}} within the next 3 seconds.
wikia_skill_e1.notes: * ''Tempest's'' {{tip|sight}} is not removed when ''Lee Sin'' casts ''Cripple'' (unlike {{ais|Sonic Wave|Lee Sin}}).

wikia_skill_r1.name: Dragon's Rage
wikia_skill_r1.blurb: Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick launching his target back, dealing physical damage to the target and any enemies they collide with. Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air for a short duration. This technique was taught to him by Jesse Perring, although Lee Sin does not kick players off the map.
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lee Sin''' instantly {{tip|root|roots}} the target enemy champion for {{tt|{{fd|0.25}}|Estimated}} seconds after which he roundhouse kicks them dealing {{as|physical damage}} and {{tip|airborne|knocking them back}} 1200 units over 1 second.
wikia_skill_r1.description2: Enemies hit by the displaced enemy receive {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} and are {{tip|airborne|knocked up}} for 1 second.
wikia_skill_r1.leveling2: {{st|Collision Damage|{{ap|150 to 600}} {{as|(+ 200% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|12 to 18}}% of kicked target's '''bonus''' health)}}}}
wikia_skill_r1.notes:
* If ''Dragon's Rage's'' target dies when first hit there will be no displacement of any kind.
** The {{tip|airborne|displacement's}} direction is decided at the moment of impact and not by ''Lee Sin'' and his target's relative locations on-cast (the only way for ''Lee Sin'' to control where his target is displaced is by using {{si|Flash}} before ''Dragon's Rage's'' cast time ends).
* ''Dragon's Rage'' applies {{tip|single target}} spell effect to the main target and {{tip|area of effect}} to enemies hit by the main-target-projectile.
* The ability will go on cooldown after dealing its damage.
** Because of this, if {{ri|Electrocute}} procs from the root and kills the enemy the ability will not go on cooldown.
